title: Minecraft 基岩版 Beta 1.14.0.4 发布
author: zyjking
txt_content:
本帖最后由 zyjking 于 2019-10-31 10:37 编辑 

测试版是Minecraft基岩版的测试机制，主要用于下一个正式版的特性预览。
然而，测试版主要用于新特性展示，通常存在大量漏洞。因此对于普通玩家建议仅做测试尝鲜用。使用测试版打开存档前请务必备份。适用于正式版的领域服务器与测试版不兼容。
如果在测试版中遇到旧版存档无法使用的问题，测试版将允许你将存档上传以供开发团队查找问题。
Minecraft 基岩版 1.14 仍未发布，1.14.0.4为其第4个测试版。
转载本贴时须要注明原作者以及本帖地址。
原文链接：https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360035697731

Changes:更改：Honey bottles can now be stacked, and can be crafted with empty bottles and a honey block蜂蜜瓶可以堆叠了，也可以用空瓶和蜂蜜快制作
Fixes:bug修复：修复了11个bugCrashes/Performance崩溃/性能
Fixed several crashes that could occur during gameplay修复了游玩时可能发生的崩溃问题Fixed a crash that could occur when opening the character creator with a custom skin selected修复了打开角色创建器并选中自定义皮肤时发生的崩溃问题

General常规
Fixed another issue that was causing player skins to revert to a default Alex or Steve after relaunching the game修复了另一个重启游戏后会导致皮肤恢复成默认的Steve或Alex的问题Platform specific skins can now be seen in the Character Creator在角色创建器中可以看到其它特殊平台上的皮肤了Split-screen players now see the correct player avatars in the pause menu在暂停菜单中可以正确看到分屏游玩的玩家头像了Fixed an issue that was preventing the "Sail the 7 Seas" achievement from being unlocked on Xbox One修复了在Xbox One上无法正确解锁“Sail the 7 Seas”拯救的问题Fixed an issue with the screen reader option being enabled even after dismissal (MCPE-43306)修复了关闭屏幕阅读器后仍然会启用的问题Fixed an issue that was causing the player skin to take too long to load in (MCPE-45038)修复了游戏主界面的皮肤加载太慢的问题

Gameplay游玩
The 'Body Guard' achievement can be unlocked once again成就“Body Guard”可以解锁了

Items物品
The Honey bottle and Honeycomb textures now match those in Java Edition (MCPE-53547)蜂蜜瓶和蜜脾的材质现与Java版匹配一致

Add-Ons and Script EngineAdd-Ons和脚本引擎
Fixed a bug that was causing tamed entity damage to be counted as coming from mounted players修复了导致玩家骑乘导致驯服的实体损坏的问题
